attributes.additional_details:
Pakistan’s state sponsored terrorism has led to an alleged ethnic cleansing of the Balochi people of its province of Baluchistan. The Baluchi people are demanding freedom from Pakistan to save their people.

Countries around the world, including Japan, France, USA, Russia and Saudi Arabia have slammed Pakistan for providing a safe haven for terrorists. Its time for the world community represented by the United Nations to hold Pakistan accountable by declaring it a terrorist state.
attributes.background: The latest attack by Pakistan backed terrorists on Indian army base in Uri which took lives of 18 Indian soldiers has outraged Indians and other communities around the world. It is time to accept the reality that Pakistan has been providing a safe haven for terrorists.

rejection.details:
The United Kingdom does not declare nations as a 'Terrorist State'.

You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to take a specific action to address your concerns about Pakistan.
